title: SOLDD T206 Dark Cap Hal Chase AB and Cycle 350 SOLDDD

posts.post_title: SOLDD T206 Dark Cap Hal Chase AB and Cycle 350 SOLDDD
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I am trying to stack a little cash to buy a card that I would like, so I need to sell some stuff.
Here we have a couple tougher backed Hal Chase cards.
I would like to sell as a pair for $135, and PP is fine.  Offers good too!!!

Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
